import React, { useCallback, useContext, useState } from "react" import { withRouter, Redirect } from "react-router" import { login } from "../../api/auth" import "./Login.css" function Login() { const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const { email, password } = e.target.elements login(email.value, password.value) .then((res) => { console.log(res) }) .catch((err) => {}) } return (
